content.html: These takes are in such a terrible techno bubble that we fully forget that most hostile account take overs happen when a relationship goes south. Revenge porn comes from malware specialists, sure, but it's usually your angry ex partner who had your password or PIN with consent.
content.value:
These takes are in such a terrible techno bubble that we fully forget that most hostile account take overs happen when a relationship goes south.

Revenge porn comes from malware specialists, sure, but it's usually your angry ex partner who had your password or PIN with consent.
